name: Freedom of Devon & Cornwall Rover (3 in 7 or 8 in 15)
description:
FREEDOM OF DEVON & CORNWALL ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for either any 3 days in 7 days or any 8 days in 15 days. The area includes the whole of Devon and Cornwall and extends as far east 
      as Tiverton Parkway and Axminster all the way to Penzance. It includes the English Riviera seaside towns of Torquay and Paignton and the Devon and Cornish branch lines to Barnstaple, Exmouth, Paignton, Gunnislake, Okehampton, Looe, Newquay, 
      Falmouth and St.Ives.
